story.title: Storyboard
story.subtitle: Contrast Between Two Worlds

scene1.title: Scene 1: Money Rain
scene1.description: In a luxurious ballroom, people cheer as gold coins rain down. This is the carnival in dreams, where everything is beautiful.

scene2.title: Scene 2: Peak of Success
scene2.description: The protagonist stands atop a skyscraper, overlooking the city's prosperity. In dreams, he is a successful entrepreneur with everything.

scene1.title: Scene 1: Factory Floor
scene1.description: In a dim factory, workers repeat mechanical motions. This is the cruelty of reality, day after day of labor.

scene2.title: Scene 2: Struggling Life
scene2.description: The protagonist worries about making ends meet in a cramped rental room. In reality, he's just an ordinary worker.

story.irony: Two sides of a coin, reflecting life's absurdity and truth

protagonist.name: Li Ming
protagonist.dreamDesc: In dreams, Li Ming is a successful entrepreneur with luxury cars and mansions, respected by all.
protagonist.realityDesc: In reality, Li Ming is an ordinary factory worker, repeating mechanical work every day.
protagonist.ultimate: Dual Life: Freely switch between dream and reality

lover.name: Xiao Mei
lover.dreamDesc: In dreams, Xiao Mei is Li Ming's perfect lover, gentle and caring, sharing life together.
lover.realityDesc: In reality, Xiao Mei is just a stranger Li Ming met on the bus.
lover.ultimate: Phantom Love: Create perfect love illusions

mentor.name: Lao Wang
mentor.dreamDesc: In dreams, Lao Wang is Li Ming's life mentor, giving him wisdom and guidance.
mentor.realityDesc: In reality, Lao Wang is Li Ming's coworker, working together in the factory.
mentor.ultimate: Eye of Truth: See through the essence of dreams and reality

director.title: Director's Vision
director.subtitle: A Visual Poem of Magical Realism

profile.title: Director Profile
profile.name: Li Ming
profile.education: Master of Film Studies, University of Bologna
profile.bio: Director Li Ming excels at combining magical realism with social criticism, telling stories of ordinary people with unique visual language. His works have won awards at multiple international film festivals and he is hailed as 'the most promising Chinese director of the new generation'.

list.award: Golden Lion for Best Short Film

visual.title: Visual Aesthetics
visual.content: Using strong color contrasts and light-shadow changes to create visual differences between dreams and reality. Gold represents luxury in dreams, gray symbolizes oppression in reality.

narrative.title: Narrative Structure
narrative.content: Adopting non-linear narrative, freely switching between dreams and reality, allowing audiences to experience the protagonist's mental state and contemplate life's meaning.

music.title: Music Design
music.content: Fusing electronic music with traditional folk music to create a unique auditory experience. Music in dreams is gorgeous and psychedelic, while in reality it's monotonous and oppressive.

culture.title: Cultural Criticism
culture.content: Through magical realism, criticizing contemporary society's consumerism and class solidification, exploring the survival dilemmas of ordinary people.

manifesto.title: Director's Statement
manifesto.part1: Cinema is the art of dreams and the mirror of reality. Through 'Lucky Coin', I hope audiences see their own reflections and contemplate life's meaning.
manifesto.part2: A coin has two sides, as does life. We all struggle between dreams and reality, seeking our own answers.
manifesto.part3: This film doesn't aim to provide answers, but to raise questions. What is real? What is illusion? How should we face life's absurdity?
